price: ߣߌ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߤߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߖߍ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߲߫ ߢߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزۡقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā lariz'qunā mā lahu min nafādin
